app_name: VHS Star Effects - Camcorder Video Creator FX
app_detail:
â˜† [ VHS Star Effect - Camcorder Video Creator FX ] is the best video editor and movie editor to shoot a vhs and retro video. You can easily make videos for Youtube, Insta and Tik tok. Easy edit video with star effects and filters to make pop video. 

With minimum operations, an awesome video combined with magic effects, fantastic filters, popular themes, special doodle, hot music will be shown. Download Video Maker now and become a movie expert! 

VHS Camcorder record aesthetic and trippy videos with numerous powerful real-time video filters, ranging from Star RGB glitches, VHS, trippy, sketch, grainy, pixelated filters, to vaporwave effects

Camcorder Video Creator FX is a wonderful app to help artists to create the most unique and perfect VHS Star and vaporwave retro videos. 

ğŸ¬ Video Filter Editor&Video Color Editor & Backgrounds 
â˜† 10+ video filters/movie filters in video maker to make your video like a movie!
â˜† Adjust Brightness, contrast, saturation etc to change video color.

ğŸ¬ Video Trimmer & Cutter
â˜† Trim and cut the video to the length you need. Export video in HD quality. Easy-to-use video maker for YouTube

ğŸ¬ Star VHS FX Video Effects Maker
â˜† Video editor with effects : glich, mosaic, mirror etc.
â˜† 20+ free movie style video effects filters make your video cool

ğŸ¬ Video Filters and FX Effects
â˜† Retro Star VHS for Tik tok support add beautiful movie style video filters and FX effects to video.

ğŸ¬ VHS Video Color Adjust
â˜† Star VHS adjust video's brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. It provides customized video filters and effects option.

ğŸ¬ Change Video Aspect Ratio
â˜† VHS Star fit your video in any Aspect Ratios like 1:1, 16:9, 3:2, etc. No crop video maker and video zip app.

ğŸ¬ Save and Share video 
â˜† Easy to share video to social media like. YT, Insta, FB , WhatsApp, Tik Tok etc.

ğŸš€ Feature for VHS Star Effects 90s
â˜† Mega Photo for Video and Picture to make video show
â˜† Star VHS Glitch Creator photography: I can choose images from your library or taking pictures of memorable moments to create video picture with my own music or video show with my own music for android 
â˜† Edit Video For Tik tok Add your favorite music to video or you can choose our available music or record your voice 
â˜† VHS Camcorder creator add wonderful filters or stunning effects to make your video professional than ever
â˜† Photo Video Editor & Maker
â˜† You can preview video, adjust the order of photos, change focus, replace the image, add / change music, or edit caption on the happy birthday video show with music
â˜† Star Edit Video For Tik tok Photo and Video Editor
â˜† Edit Video For Tik tok add other details to picture slideshow with music such as Sticker / Image / Text or insert a recording into the video. You can change the duration of the video, the length of the image
â˜† Photo to Video Maker
â˜† Camcorder VHS Effect Creator: This feature enables you to cut one Retro Vintage effects creator into smaller videos and have wonderful moment in certain slideshow with music and pictures and videos
â˜† Add Sticker to Video: We have a lot of free stickers and funny icons in video creator photo slide with music 
â˜† Photo to Video Converter
â˜† VHS Camcorder 90s Effect Video of photos with song: Allows you to choose multiple images at once, or choose photo video show with music at once 

Thank you for your interest in our VHS Star Effect - Camcorder Video Creator FX
